job_description:
Rincian Lowongan

Job Description
- Collaborate with the Presales Team to understand and analyze business process workflows.
- Assist in developing simple applications or automation tools to improve workflow efficiency.
- Contribute to workflow automation projects such as Asset Management and Bidding Management.
- Support documentation, testing, and improvement of automation solutions.

Requirements
- Student or fresh graduate majoring in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field.

- Familiar with Microsoft Excel and the Microsoft 365 ecosystem (e.g., SharePoint, Power Automate, Forms), & Odoo.

- Good understanding of basic mathematical and logical functions (especially Excel formulas).
- Experience or knowledge in process automation or workflow development is a plus.
- Detail-oriented, proactive, and eager to learn new tools or systems.
- Able to commit to a 6-month internship program.
- Willing to work fully on-site (WFO) at Jakarta Pusat.
